original_text: Jephthah sent men with a message to the Ammonite king. He asked, ‘Why have you come to fight against our people? What have we done to make you angry?’
korean_text: 입다가 암몬 자손의 왕에게 사자들을 보내 이르되 네가 나와 무슨 상관이 있기에 내 땅을 치러 내게 왔느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: Jephthah sent men with a message
Why have you come to fight against our people?
What have we done to make you angry?
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 무엇을 했기에 당신을 화나게 했습니까?
